meanings.sent1: The endoskeletal structure of the body provides support and protection.
meanings.sent2: Animals with endoskeletal systems include humans, dogs, and cats.
meanings.sent3: The endoskeletal framework of the robot made it surprisingly flexible.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were supported by an endoskeletal framework of evidence.
meanings.sent5: The endoskeletal design of the building allowed for easy modifications.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an internal skeleton
meanings.sent1: The endoskeletal features of the dinosaur fossils fascinated the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The endoskeletal nature of vertebrates distinguishes them from invertebrates.
meanings.sent3: The endoskeletal decorations in the room gave it a spooky vibe.
meanings.sent4: His endoskeletal beliefs formed the core of his philosophy.
meanings.sent5: The endoskeletal appearance of the structure hinted at its strength.
